message.body: $10/hr. shouldn't take more than about 2 hrs with raking and blowing and general tidying up.
Sure! I'll probably come out tomorrow to say hi, catch you then or later this week. How's lucky??

Ok, great! Yup I'll be here tomorrow eve and we can chat about the details. I'll be riding him at about 6 pm. He's super, no head tossing at all over the weekend! Got his shoes fixed too. He was due! 5 weeks the day you found that loose nail! :) lol! See ya tomorrow! Thanks!
I'm making my way to the barn too, see you soon!
